name: King's Raid
summary: King's Raid is a free-to-play side-scrolling RPG mobile game developed by South Korean indie game developer Vespa and initially published by Thailand-based company GloHow, before the Vespa took over the rights in June 2017. It was first released on September 2016 for operating systems Android and iOS in Thailand.
